1.content: Are you a male or a female?
1.title: Starting Off Strong

11.content:
WHO ARE YOU?

Jimmy Sanders- a 10 year old boy

Derek Thomas- a 18 year old athletic high school student

Stephen Rogers- a 40 year old businessman

Louis Miller- a 70 year old retired senior citizen
11.title: Male

choices: A 15 year old brunette teenage girl
113.content:
Stephen Rogers was a fairly good looking man. He had no children, no wife, and pretty much lived the life of a bachelor.

His job was solid and he was a superstar at the marketing firm where he worked. He kept in really good shape, ate well, had a nice apartment, and even knows how to score women at the bar. Despite this he never found a woman who had that certain spark that would ignite the fire in his chest.

One day, Stephen was going to his car from work when he saw what looked like a tiny person scampering at his feet.

"Huh? What is that?" Stephen looked down closer and saw that it was a tiny female, but not just any female, below him he could see that the five inch tall female was...
113.title: Stephen Rogers

choices: A 13 year old red head girl
114.content:
Louis Miller was your average senior citizen. He spent his days mostly lounging around in his chair, playing bingo, and waiting for time to go by.

His days were punctuated by his bland meals, daytime television and sexy nurses who would come to visit him. Louis was a very perverted man. He was married three times with no children and all of them left due to his sleaziness.

But despite this, Louis had come to grips with that at his old age he likely would not be able to have the same sexual pursuits that he had in his life.

However, one day Louis was on a senior citizens trip to the park. Everyone was sort of walking around and minding their own business when Louis saw something in the grass. He got up to investigate and despite his slow speed and aching back, he crouched down to see what it was. To his utter surprise, Louis saw a tiny female scampering around in the grass. He had never seen a person so tiny, and the sight of her gave him an instant hard on.

This tiny person that Louis was spotted was...
114.title: Louis Miller

12.content:
Who are you?

Katie Willis- A 10 year old girl who loves dolls

Lexi Wheeler- A 16 year old girl who loves gossip and shopping

Miranda Scott- A 40 year old CEO of a large company
12.title: Female

info.brief_description: Someone discovers a tiny female somewhere and fun ensues.
info.description:
You are a man or woman who comes across a 3 to 6 inch tall female and decides to help/keep them.

RULES

No scat/piss/diaper
No unbirth
No Male/Male interaction
No characters under 9
No rushed endings
No one sentence chapters
